评论详情: Fits nice. I don't have pencil legs, so it is tight in the thighs but loosens up a tad when wearing shoes. Sizing it off. I'm skinny fat (6'3" / 215lbs). So I don't look out of shape but I have a slight beer belly. Vest fit well and it seems to be made with a little more quality. But vests are normally thicker than pants. The pants are thin like pajama pants, tight in the thighs and loose in the waist but I think it'll be okay with a belt. The length is perfect. I wear 34 x 34 jeans normally.. you can see the pocket lining through the material as well. I bought the beige color and wore sky blue briefs. I could not see the underwear through the pants when looking in the mirror. This was just a quick try-on to see how it fit. I will update soon after the wife sees it.

This also came QUICKLY which we needed since our first suit shipped, from another company,  was an XS vest and M pants! He danced. He jumped.  We just used an iron before the dance and didn't need to dry clean it before the dance!
